title: Classes & Schedule
content: Weekly Lamrim study (Sun 10am); Online Dharma talks (Thu 8pm); Discovering Buddhism intake Nov 12.

title: Donation & Sponsorship
content: Funds: General, Education, Library, Compassion. Payment via SGQR/PayNow & Credit Card.

title: Visiting the Centre
content: Singapore (24 abc street). Volunteers welcome via #volunteer.
